entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
